text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The spring Tenno Sho that my third<n>win depends on—I'd like
Rice there<n>too.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Rice... in the Tenno Sho?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Why risk her chance to make history<n>by letting another
strong contender<n>onto the field?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The booing at the Kikuka Sho...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Denying Bourbon's Triple Crown<n>was a feat worthy of
praise, and yet<n>the exact opposite reactions were the<n>
loudest.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As chance would have it, the stakes<n>at the Kikuka Sho are
closely mirrored<n>by the upcoming Tenno Sho.
choice_data_list: So you want Rice to run because...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Because there's a certain sight I<n>would have her see there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Some things can only be taught by a<n>fellow runner, and I
wish to take on<n>that responsibility.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You, Trainer, have your own part to<n>play—getting Rice into the
Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The importance of this race for<n>McQueen cannot be
understated.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No doubt she thought long and hard<n>before making this
request.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But is she really okay with this?<n>Won't Rice being there
distract her<n>from her own running?
choice_data_list:
You might not get another shot at three
consecutive wins. Are you sure about this?

You might not get another shot at three
consecutive wins. Are you sure about this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh. You think I'm going to lose, doyou? I am very hurt.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For the record, I have no intention oflosing. On my pride as a Mejiro, Ishall achieve my thirdconsecutive Tenno Sho title.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You sure have a difficult job before<n>you. No matter which of
us wins,<n>you'll have to console the other.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She flashes a teasing smile, but the<n>upcoming race is
anything but fun and<n>games to her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If this sight she wants Rice to see is<n>that important to her,
then who am I to<n>say no?
choice_data_list: All right, I'll have Rice run too.
All right, I'll have Rice run too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Good. I trust you'll keep your word.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At training the following day...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Um, how was mytime?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her times aren't bad. But when shepractices against anyone, shejust can't win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Getting booed at the Kikuka Sho has<n>made her shy away
from being<n>competitive.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Good. You'll be able to contend in the<n>big leagues.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Good. You'll be able to contend in the<n>big leagues.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: The big leagues? Have you decided<n>my next race?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She won't like the decision. But if<n>she's to ever win again...
choice_data_list: You'll be running in the spring Tenno Sho.
You'll be running in the spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...What? The spring Tenno Sho?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You have what it takes. You proved<n>that at the Kikuka Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
B-but... McQueen has her third<n>consecutive Tenno Sho riding
on that<n>race...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: It's so important to her, I can'tcompete. Even if I win, I'll just...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower hangs her head as if she<n>can hear the boos
again.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Practice ends without her agreeing to<n>the race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I won't force her to race if she<n>doesn't want to, but this
can't go on<n>forever.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You're Rice's trainer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon interrupts her<n>training to talk to me.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hey, Bourbon. Training all by<n>yourself?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Hey, Bourbon. Training all by<n>yourself?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Yes. An injury I sustained after the<n>Kikuka Sho has finally
healed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: How is Rice doing? Is she still hung<n>up on what happened?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bourbon was up on that stage too,<n>right beside Rice.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She saw firsthand how much damage<n>the booing did.
choice_data_list: She's... not quite back to her usual self.
She's... not quite back to her usual self.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...I train after-hours like this not<n>because of some directive to
achieve<n>victory, but because I want to.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I simply can't stifle the urge to run.<n>And it all started when I
lost to Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I want to race her again, and I want to<n>win this time. That is
why I train.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice was the first ever to put a<n>scratch on Bourbon's
undefeated<n>record.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Sounds like she's converted that<n>setback into motivation.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice was exactly the same way.<n>Having a rival pushed her
to work<n>harder.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Is there anything I can do? In order<n>to meet her on the turf
once more.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Bourbon...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
"I want to win." The same ambition<n>that Rice has lost,
Bourbon has gained<n>anew.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: If Rice could see Bourbon now...
choice_data_list: Yeah, I could use your help.
Yeah, I could use your help.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Understood. I'll do as you wish—I<n>mean, it is my wish to
help.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Noticing the semblance of a smile on<n>Bourbon's lips, I can't
help but feel<n>like things are looking up.
